entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
